section.title: Questions or remarks?
section.p: We are looking forward to your feedback on this software. The best way to do so and for asking questions about ConExp is the Conexp user's mailing list: conexp-user.at.lists.sourceforge.net.

section.title: Spring into action!
section.p: If you would like to join our team do not hesitate to tell us, you are welcome. To contact us, use the adress conexp-user.at.lists.sourceforge.net.
